scripts.scss: onerror 'node-sass --output-style compressed -o static/css/ scss/' --title 'Error compiling SCSS' --icon error
scripts.compile: onerror 'babel scripts/*.es -d scripts/ --presets=@babel/preset-env' --title 'Error compiling JS (Babel)' --icon error
scripts.uglify: onerror 'uglifyjs scripts/*.js -m -c -o static/js/app.min.js' --title 'Error uglifying JS' --icon error
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run uglify
scripts.scss:dev: onerror 'node-sass -o public/css/ scss/' --title 'Error compiling SCSS' --icon error
scripts.uglify:dev: onerror 'uglifyjs scripts/*.js -o public/js/app.min.js' --title 'Error uglifying JS' --icon error
scripts.build:css:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run uglify:dev
scripts.watch:css:dev: onchange 'scss/*.scss' -- npm run build:css:dev && npm run kss
